activities:
VeriFone's US datacenters will receive certain trip data for taxi cab rides taken by passengers in the United Kingdom, including information relating to the driver of the taxicab.  VeriFone provides a payment system for the operators of taxis in the United Kingdom.

VeriFone also processes EEA personal data relating to (1) employees of its subsidiaries for purposes of global HR administration and management; (2) contacts of actual and prospective corporate customers and business partners in order to manage business relationships; (3) product end users and prospects in order to provide service and product information; (4) client data; (5) website data; and (6) individuals whose data VeriFone processes on behalf of business customers as a mere data processor.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
personaldata: trip data; client data; off-line; manually processed; website data; HR data
recoursemech: We will cooperate with the EU data protection authorities (DPAs)
